name: Crumbling Mind
description:
Crumbling Mind is a platformer in which the protagonist is emotionally unstable. They oscillate between anxiety and depression. Only their teddy bear is able to calm their mind. Will they be able to reach the hospital before it's too late?

Made for the LudumDare 49 by :

  • Noé (Nolkaloid) - Code
  • Raph - Design and Code
  • kristoph - Amazing Art
  • Benjamin (Pinguee) - Music (psst... his Spotify)
